Topic Summary: Whether or not the Appellant's partnership had the right to require the VAT it had overpaid to be offset by the Respondent against its VAT liabilities, notwithstanding that the time during which it could have claimed a refund of the overpaid VAT had elapsed.
Tax Legislation: Section 99 of VATCA 2010, Section 119(1) of the 2010 Act, Section 865B of TCA 1997, section 1006A of TCA 1997
